alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 8:32PM CDT until September 19 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Archer County in northern Texas... East central Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 832 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Lake Kickapoo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Archer City and Lake Kickapoo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
